name: MimiSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on lamp”
”Alexa, set dimmer to 45%”
”Alexa, set radiator temperature to 25 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill allows you to control your MimiSmart Smart Home using Alexa.
For integration with Alex, a CUARM5m device is required.
To connect the skill you will need to enter the serial number of your CUARM5m device and password.
You can find the serial number on the side panel of your device or in the overview section of the device’s web interface.
In the password field, enter the same password that you use to enter the device’s web interface.
After entering the serial number and password, you will be asked to provide the skill access to the devices of your smart home.
After granting permissions you can ask Alexa to discover new devices.
After finding devices, they are ready to use.
Enjoy MimiSmart Smart Home system with Alexa voice control!
